intro.title: Welcome to $Ricardo game!
intro.content:
Put in your BSC wallet address if you want to be eligible to win the weekly prize.

You must hold a minimum of X Ricardo to be able to win.

how_to_play.title: How to play
how_to_play.content:
Will the next card be higher or lower than the previous one? Choose from 3 cards, with each correct guess increasing your winnings.

You can cashout at any time, but for every 5 correct answers a multiplier will be applied to your score.

If you have entered your name and wallet, you'll be placed on the leaderboard. The player with the highest score and winnings will win a prize!
